thread.title: BRIEF-Trevali Provides Mineral Reserves And Mineral Resources Statements, Outlines 2018 Exploration Plans

title: BRIEF-Trevali Provides Mineral Reserves And Mineral Resources Statements, Outlines 2018 Exploration Plans
text:
April 16, 2018 / 1:36 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Trevali Provides Mineral Reserves And Mineral Resources Statements, Outlines 2018 Exploration Plans Reuters Staff 
April 16 (Reuters) - Trevali Mining Corp: 
* TREVALI PROVIDES MINERAL RESERVES AND MINERAL RESOURCES STATEMENTS; OUTLINES 2018 EXPLORATION PLANS 
* TREVALI MINING - COMMITTED 2018 EXPLORATION BUDGET AT FOUR OPERATING MINES HAS BEEN INCREASED TO US$13 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
